thread.title: Get On Point with the Latest Trends at the Points Fall Fashion Show
thread.title_full: Get On Point with the Latest Trends at the Points Fall Fashion Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Get On Point with the Latest Trends at the Points Fall Fashion Show
text:
Fall is upon us, and that means one thing: fashion week! The Point will be hosting its biggest style event of the year, featuring must-haves of the season for both men and women, to benefit Sandpipers.
El Segundo, California (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
The summer season has come to an end, and although we will all miss the long summer nights, minimal clothing and smell of suntan lotion, fall brings many great things when it comes to fashion. Runways across the globe have geared up to present the must-have trends of the season and on Saturday, October 17th, at 3pm The Point is joining in on all the fun with its biggest style event of the year! The Point’s Fall Fashion Show is not only the perfect way to kick off the upcoming fall season but also a great opportunity to give back. Proceeds from the event will benefit the local South Bay non-profit organization, Sandpipers .
The afternoon show will feature scenes of the season’s best looks from The Point retailers such as Michael Stars, Lucky Brand, Bella Beach Kids, Marmi, No Rest For Bridget, prAna, Soul Cycle and more. Tickets are on sale now at http://www.ThePointSB.com . Tickets start at $50 for General Admission and top off at $75 for VIP front row seating. Availability is limited, so purchase your ticket before it’s too late! Included in the price is seating to view the runway show, pre-event champagne and light appetizers, a Passion for Fashion shopping card that entitles guests to incentives at The Point shops and restaurants, prize drawings and in-store after parties.
Registration begins in The Point Plaza at 2:45 p.m.
For media inquiries, please contact Kyrstin Riley at Melrose PR - kyrstin(at)melrosepr(dot)com or call 310-260-7901. For retail leasing information please visit http://www.thepointsb.com or contact: Jeffrey Kreshek at 310.414.5285 or jkreshek(at)federalrealty(dot)com, or Bob Baker at 310.546.8144 or bob.baker(at)bmw-re(dot)com.
